alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Lake Effect Snow Warning issued January 06 at 3:10PM EST until January 07 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy lake effect snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches in the most persistent lake snows. * WHERE...Jefferson and Lewis counties. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Experimental content below...do not use operationally To view the experimental polygons please see: http://www.weather.gov/buf/lespolygon COORD...4406 7516 4409 7536 4403 7589 4395 7620 4383 7629 4382 7614 4374 7601 4374 7581 4388 7552 4392 7522 TIME Y22M01D06T1500Z-Y22M01D06T2100Z COORD...4397 7548 4405 7548 4407 7584 4399 7634 4386 7637 4383 7629 4374 7628 4367 7623 4367 7617 4384 7569 TIME Y22M01D06T2100Z-Y22M01D07T0600Z
info.instruction: Heavy snow will fall in relatively narrow bands. If traveling, be prepared for rapidly changing road conditions and visibilities. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
